Class DefaultPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals.DefaultPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultOptionsElement, IsDefaultPoint, IsDefaultPointStyleHandler

    public final class DefaultPoint
extends Object
implements IsDefaultPoint
    CHART.JS default values for POINT element.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
